meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unnecessary or not needed.
meanings.sent1: The needlessness of the extra paperwork caused frustration among the employees.
meanings.sent2: The needlessness of the second meeting was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The needlessness of wearing a winter coat in the summer made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The needlessness of carrying an umbrella in the desert was as clear as day.
meanings.sent5: The needlessness of using a calculator for simple addition was quite obvious.
